name: Enchanted Armor
text: Play Enchanted Armor under the control of any investigator at your location. Forced - After damage and/or horror is placed on Enchanted Armor: The owner of Enchanted Armor tests [willpower] (X), where X is the total amount of damage and horror on it. If the test fails, discard Enchanted Armor and assign the damage and/or horror just placed on it elsewhere.
real_text: Play Enchanted Armor under the control of any investigator at your location. Forced - After damage and/or horror is placed on Enchanted Armor: The owner of Enchanted Armor tests [willpower] (X), where X is the total amount of damage and horror on it. If the test fails, discard Enchanted Armor and assign the damage and/or horror just placed on it elsewhere.

name: Blessing of Isis
text: [reaction] When a second [bless] token is revealed during a single skill test at your location, exhaust Blessing of Isis: Cancel that token and treat it as if it were a [elder_sign] token instead. Return both of those tokens to the chaos bag after this test ends.
real_text: [reaction] When a second [bless] token is revealed during a single skill test at your location, exhaust Blessing of Isis: Cancel that token and treat it as if it were a [elder_sign] token instead. Return both of those tokens to the chaos bag after this test ends.

name: Cryptic Grimoire
text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] event during your turn, spend 2 secrets: That event gains fast. Reduce its cost by 1.
real_text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] When you play an [[Insight]] event during your turn, spend 2 secrets: That event gains fast. Reduce its cost by 1.

name: Cryptic Grimoire
text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] When you would draw the top card of the encounter deck, spend 5 secrets: Draw a card from your deck instead.
real_text:
Researched.
[reaction]: After you resolve 1 or more [curse] tokens during a skill test: Place that many secrets on Cryptic Grimoire.
[reaction] When you would draw the top card of the encounter deck, spend 5 secrets: Draw a card from your deck instead.

name: Ríastrad
text: Fight. When you initiate this attack, add up to 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. For each [curse] token added to the chaos bag in this way, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
real_text: Fight. When you initiate this attack, add up to 3 [curse] tokens to the chaos bag. For each [curse] token added to the chaos bag in this way, you get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Tristan Botley
text:
[reaction] After your turn begins: Choose two skills. Until the start of your next turn, you get +1 to each of those skills.
[reaction] After any skill test ends in which a total of 3 or more [curse] or [bless] tokens were revealed: Play Tristan Botley from your hand, at no cost.
real_text:
[reaction] After your turn begins: Choose two skills. Until the start of your next turn, you get +1 to each of those skills.
[reaction] After any skill test ends in which a total of 3 or more [curse] or [bless] tokens were revealed: Play Tristan Botley from your hand, at no cost.
flavor: "Nothin's ever gonna be the same, Vito."

name: Curse of Aeons
text: [reaction] When a second [curse] token is revealed during a single skill test at your location, exhaust Curse of Aeons: Cancel that token and treat it as if it were a [skull] token instead. You may choose to remove both of those tokens from the chaos bag after the test ends.
real_text: [reaction] When a second [curse] token is revealed during a single skill test at your location, exhaust Curse of Aeons: Cancel that token and treat it as if it were a [skull] token instead. You may choose to remove both of those tokens from the chaos bag after the test ends.

name: Unrelenting
text:
Max 1 committed per test.
After you commit Unrelenting to a skill test, search the chaos bag for up to 3 non-[auto_fail] chaos tokens of your choice, and seal them on Unrelenting. If all 3 tokens sealed on Unrelenting are "+1,", "0," [bless], and/or [elder_sign] tokens, draw 2 cards. Release all tokens sealed here after this test ends.
real_text:
Max 1 committed per test.
After you commit Unrelenting to a skill test, search the chaos bag for up to 3 non-[auto_fail] chaos tokens of your choice, and seal them on Unrelenting. If all 3 tokens sealed on Unrelenting are "+1,", "0," [bless], and/or [elder_sign] tokens, draw 2 cards. Release all tokens sealed here after this test ends.

name: Signum Crucis
text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing, and only if the difficulty of that test is higher than your base skill value.
After you commit Signum Crucis to a skill test, add X [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. X is the difference between the test's difficulty and your base skill value.
real_text:
Commit only to a skill test you are performing, and only if the difficulty of that test is higher than your base skill value.
After you commit Signum Crucis to a skill test, add X [bless] tokens to the chaos bag. X is the difference between the test's difficulty and your base skill value.

name: Horror in High Gear
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -1 (-3 instead if there are 6 or fewer locations remaining in the Road deck).
[cultist]: -1. For each point you fail by, an investigator in your vehicle places 1 of their clues on your location.
[tablet]: -2. For each point you fail by, an investigator in your vehicle loses 1 resource.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.
real_text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -1 (-3 instead if there are 6 or fewer locations remaining in the Road deck).
[cultist]: -1. For each point you fail by, an investigator in your vehicle places 1 of their clues on your location.
[tablet]: -2. For each point you fail by, an investigator in your vehicle loses 1 resource.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -2 (-4 instead if there are 6 or fewer locations remaining in the Road deck).
[cultist]: -2. For each point you fail by, an investigator in your vehicle places 1 of their clues on your location.
[tablet]: -3. For each point you fail by, an investigator in your vehicle loses 1 resource.
[elder_thing]: -4. Resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play.

name: The Chase is On! (v. I)
text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - At the end of the round: Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has Victory X and has no clues on it). Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.
real_text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - At the end of the round: Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has Victory X and has no clues on it). Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.
flavor: On your way to Falcon Point, you are ambushed by agents of the Order!

linked_card.name: The Terror of Devil Reef
linked_card.text:
Spawn - Rearmost location.

Hunter. Massive. Retaliate.

Forced - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round.
linked_card.real_text: Spawn - Rearmost location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. Forced - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round.

name: The Chase is On! (v. II)
text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - At the end of the round: Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has Victory X and has no clues on it). Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.
real_text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - At the end of the round: Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has Victory X and has no clues on it). Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.
flavor: On your way to Falcon Point, you are ambushed by agents of the Order!
back_text:
Flip over each vehicle that is running, so that it is stopped.
Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If there are 3 or 4 investigators in the game, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Vehicle]] enemy or Malfunction treachery is discarded. The lead investigator draws that card.
back_flavor: Just as you think you might be able to escape unscathed, you hear the telltale sputtering of your engine struggling to keep up with your demands. You curse and briefly stop your car before it stalls. You have only seconds to get it started again before the cultists catch up to you!

name: Hot Pursuit
text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - At the end of the round: Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has Victory X and has no clues on it). Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.
real_text: As an additional cost for you to move while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - At the end of the round: Starting with the rearmost location, set each location with no vehicles, enemies, or investigators aside, out of play (or add it to the victory display if it has Victory X and has no clues on it). Stop when you reach a location with at least 1 vehicle, enemy, or investigator; or the location behind the rearmost investigator.
flavor: The Order is out for blood!
back_text: Each investigator is defeated and suffers 1 physical trauma.
back_flavor:
Day is starting to break through the trees to the east, and thanks to the interference of your relentless pursuers, you still haven't made it to Falcon Point. Your car has begun to shake and stutter. You know it is only a matter of minutes before it runs out of fuel, but you have no choice. They've almost caught up to you. You force the accelerator down - 
The turn catches you by surprise. You try to skid to a halt, but it's too late. There is a brief feeling of weightlessness as the wheels leave the ground. Time slows to a crawl. Then, a whirlwind of chaos erupts around you.
The next thing you know, you are crawling out of the wreckage. You are bloody and bruised, but alive. And by some twist of fortune, your pursuers have driven past the spot of your accident. "Next time, I'm driving," Agent Harper jokes between fits of coughing.

name: Pedal to the Metal
text: Each enemy gains hunter. Forced - At the end of each investigation phase: Each vehicle that is running must move to a connecting [[Road]] location of the driver's choice. Objective - Drive to Falcon Point as fast as you can! (You will be instructed when to advance.)
real_text: Each enemy gains hunter. Forced - At the end of each investigation phase: Each vehicle that is running must move to a connecting [[Road]] location of the driver's choice. Objective - Drive to Falcon Point as fast as you can! (You will be instructed when to advance.)
flavor: Your only chance is to reach Falcon Point before your pursuers catch up to you.
back_flavor:
"I think we've lost them!" Agent Harper shouts, peeking her head out of your car's window. You glance at your rearview mirror and confirm that you no longer see the glaring headlights of your pursuers. Warm relief flutters through you. It's finally over.
For now.

name: Falcon Point Approach
text: Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Falcon Point Approach, advance.
real_text: Objective - If each undefeated investigator is at Falcon Point Approach, advance.
flavor: The road continues to wind up the side of the cliff. The lighthouse beacon at the peak shines through the fog, luring you closer.
back_flavor: "On the left the creek-threaded countryside was nearer, the narrow road to Ipswich gleaming white in the moonlight." – H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: Dimly Lit Road
text: Road 1. Forced - When a vehicle leaves this location: Investigators at this location, as a group, must spend 1 clue for each investigator in that vehicle. For each clue they could not spend, an investigator in that vehicle takes 2 horror. (Limit once per game for each vehicle.)

name: Cliffside Road
text: Road 1. Forced - When a vehicle leaves this location: Investigators at this location, as a group, must spend 2 clues for each investigator in that vehicle. [action] If you are this vehicle's driver: Draw the top card of the encounter deck. Then, move this vehicle to a connecting [[Road]] location. (Max once per round.)
[action] If you are this vehicle's driver: You stop the car. Flip this vehicle over.

name: Bumpy Ride
text: Revelation - If you are... - ...not in a vehicle, test [agility] (5). If you fail, take 3 damage. - ...in a vehicle, that vehicle's driver tests [agility] (3). If the driver fails, each investigator in your vehicle takes 2 damage.
real_text: Revelation - If you are... - ...not in a vehicle, test [agility] (5). If you fail, take 3 damage. - ...in a vehicle, that vehicle's driver tests [agility] (3). If the driver fails, each investigator in your vehicle takes 2 damage.

name: "I can't see!"
text: Revelation - If you are... - ...not in a vehicle, test [willpower] (5). If you fail, take 3 horror. - ...in a vehicle, that vehicle's driver tests [willpower] (3). If the driver fails, each investigator in your vehicle takes 2 horror.

name: Eyes in the Trees
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, you must either discard an asset you control, or discard 1 card from your hand for each point you failed by. If you fail and you are in a vehicle, each other investigator in your vehicle must also resolve this effect as if they had just failed.
real_text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (4). If you fail, you must either discard an asset you control, or discard 1 card from your hand for each point you failed by. If you fail and you are in a vehicle, each other investigator in your vehicle must also resolve this effect as if they had just failed.

name: "They're catching up!"
text: Revelation - Resolve the hunter keyword on each enemy in play. If no enemies move as a result of this effect, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Vehicle]] enemy is discarded and spawn that enemy at the rearmost location.
